mood_tracking.description: Daily mood rating on 1-10 scale with contextual notes

symptom_tracking.description: Weekly rating of specific symptoms identified in treatment plan

skill_utilization.description: Tracking use and effectiveness of learned therapeutic skills

life_satisfaction.description: Rating of satisfaction across life domains

mood_graph.description: Line graph showing mood ratings over time

symptom_radar.description: Radar chart showing changes in symptom intensity

goal_progress_bars.description: Progress bars showing movement toward specific goals

life_balance_wheel.description: Wheel diagram showing satisfaction across life domains

skill_usage_heatmap.description: Heatmap showing frequency and effectiveness of skill usage

implementation_guidelines.introduction: Introduce tracking gradually, starting with one or two measures
implementation_guidelines.frequency: Balance data collection with therapeutic conversation
implementation_guidelines.review_process: Schedule regular reviews of tracking data with user
implementation_guidelines.adjustment: Modify tracking based on user engagement and preferences
implementation_guidelines.integration: Reference tracking data in therapeutic conversations
implementation_guidelines.celebration: Use visualization to highlight progress and growth
